org.json

类 JSONException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • org.json.JSONException
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    Serializable

    public class JSONException
extends Exception
    The JSONException is thrown by the JSON.org classes when things are amiss.
    版本:
    2008-09-18
    作者:
    JSON.org
    另请参阅:
